courses.title: Bachelor of Computing
courses.description: Gain a strong computing foundation with real-world projects and internships. Specialize in Data Science or Software Engineering.

courses.title: Bachelor of Information Technology
courses.description: Focus on IT systems, software engineering, and AI. Specialize in Software Development to advance your career.

courses.title: Diploma in Information Technology
courses.description: Start with IT basics, then specialize in Infrastructure or Software Development. Includes 6 months of practical training.

courses.title: Diploma for Deaf Students
courses.description: Customized for Deaf students with SASL support. Offers workplace training and an inclusive learning environment.

courses.title: Certificate: IT (Database Development)
courses.description: Learn essential database skills for quick job entry. Focus on big data management and business solutions.

courses.title: National Certificate: IT (Systems Development)
courses.description: Develop skills in systems design and software development, preparing for immediate work or further study.
